strapiPost.title: Shop Local
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Arkansas Small Business and Technology Development Center
strapiPost.content:
With supply chain hold ups, your Christmas gifts are more than likely going to take longer to arrive, which means there is yet another reason to shop local!

  • Contribute: Especially after a hard year, Arkansas Small Business and Technology Development Center (ASBTDC) is encouraging our community to support small businesses and commit to shopping local for the holiday season. 
  • Be a part: ASBTDC has created a Holiday Gift Guide from a selection of their 2021 clients as a resource. The guide has gifts for everyone in your life, so be a part of the effort to build a thriving community and check out these local goods! 

Check out ASBTDCâ€™s NWA Holiday Gift Guide HERE.
